## Third 2023 NBA draft Look Ahead

Starter Questions:

*   What matters/doesn't matter to you different from consensus in prospect evaluation?
*   What are the player archtypes or skills that "break ties" for you?
*   What's the next fad you anticipate that defines player comps and skill set preferences?

```{r}
#| echo: false

to_age <- function(birthdate) {
  age = round(as.numeric((lubridate::as_date(Sys.Date()) - lubridate::as_date(birthdate)) / 365.25), 1)
  
  if(stringr::str_length(as.character(age)) == 2) {
    age = paste(age, ".0", sep = "")
  }
  return(as.character(age))
}

tiers <- 
  readxl::read_xlsx(
    'C:/Users/Adam Bushman/Documents/R/jabber-jazz-content-notes/master_files/2023_draft_big_boards.xlsx', 
    sheet = 'Mark'
  ) |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    age = paste(unlist(purrr::map(birthdate, to_age)), "yrs")
  ) |> 
  dplyr::select(-birthdate)

```

### Tier 1 & 2

Questions:

*   What's keeping Scoot in a tier all to himself?


```{r}
#| echo: false

tiers |>
  dplyr::filter(tier %in% c("Tier 1", "Tier 2")) |>
  gt::gt(
    rowname_col = "pick", 
    groupname_col = "tier"
  ) |>
  gt::cols_merge(
    columns = c(off_position, def_position), 
    pattern = "{1}<br>{2}"
  ) |>
  gt::cols_merge(
    columns = c(height, weight, age), 
    pattern = "{1}<br>{2}<br>{3}"
  ) |>
  gt::tab_header(
    title = "Mark's Big Board", 
    subtitle = "2023 NBA Draft | As of Feb 28th, 2023"
  ) |>
  gt::cols_label(
    name = "Prospect Name", 
    off_position = "Position", 
    height = "Measures", 
    club = "Club Name"
  ) |>
  gt::tab_source_note(source_note = "Mark | Twitter: @MarkW_E01") |>
  gt::tab_style(
    style = gt::cell_text(size = gt::px(11)), 
    locations = gt::cells_body(columns = c(height, off_position))
  ) |>
  gt::tab_options(
    heading.background.color = "#050505", 
    
    column_labels.font.weight = "bold", 
    
    row_group.background.color = "#f6ee26", 
    row_group.padding = gt::px(0), 
    
    source_notes.background.color = "#dbe2ea"
  )

```
